sledgehammer.module.discord

Class DiscordBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.module.discord.DiscordBot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.FutureCallback<de.btobastian.javacord.DiscordAPI>, de.btobastian.javacord.listener.Listener, de.btobastian.javacord.listener.message.MessageCreateListener

    public class DiscordBot
extends Printable
implements com.google.common.util.concurrent.FutureCallback<de.btobastian.javacord.DiscordAPI>, de.btobastian.javacord.listener.message.MessageCreateListener
    Class designed to handle JavaCord API executions for the ModuleDiscord module.
    Author:
    Jab
